name: Survival Knife
description: A versatile and durable cutting tool designed for use in various outdoor and survival situations. When equipped, it is used to fight monsters.

name: Band aids
description: A small, flexible medical dressings designed for covering and protecting minor cuts, scrapes, blisters,or other superficial wounds on the skin. Bandaids are used for healing.

name: Military Grade Pistol
description: A handgun that is designed and manufactured to meet the rigorous standards and requirements of military forces or law enforcement agencies. Used when equipped to shoot at monsters and has 10 shots in it.

name: Journal
description: A personal written record of someone who onced occupied the living quarters. They mention their wife so many times that her name, Rosaline, has gotten stuck in your mind.

name: Med-kit
description: A collection of essential medical supplies and equipment designed to provide immediate and basic medical care in the event of injuries, accidents, or emergencies.Heals more than a Band aids.

name: Biosample
description: Blood sample of someone who onced occupied/lived in the colony. These blood samples were taken just in case someone in the colony needed a blood transfusion.

name: Flashlight
description: A common tool used for illuminating dark or poorly lit areas and has a wide range of applications, including emergency situations.

name: Keycard
description: Plastic card used to control access to secured areas or systems.

name: Plate Carrier
description: Special type of armor designed to provide protection for people. These carriers are commonly used by military personnel, law enforcement officers, and security professionals. These carriers hold armor plates.

name: Armor Plates
description: Armor plates are the ballistic or armor plates that may be placed inside the Plate Carrier. These plates are used to replenish armor.

name: Alien Structure 1
description: There are only a few markings on this structure, but these ones are very complex. While you examine the structure, the carvings seem to emit a glow, so faint it borders on imperceptible. You canâ€™t be sure of what you saw, perhaps it was just a trick of the light.

name: Ammunition
description: Contains 10 rounds, used to reload the Pistol.

name: Keypad
description: A standard 12-key number pad, with the numbers 0-9, a pound sign and a hashtag. Despite the keypad being relatively new, you can see very slight, almost imperceptible signs of wear on keys 2, 3, 4 and 5.
